DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the changes in macular function during anti-VEGF treatment for neovascular age-related macular degeneration.
DOC.detailed_description: Macular function will be investigated using visual acuity, contrast sensitivity, mfERG and microperimetry.
DOC.criteria: Neovascular AMD in first or second eyes angiographic signs of active subfoveal or juxtafoveal choroidal neovascularization (CNV) BCVA ≥35 ETDRS letters Spherical equivalent ≥ ± 6 D Previous treatments for CNV in the studied eye
